name: Snatch
description: You call upon dark energy to steal an effect from a creature. When a creature in range activates a move with a positive effect on itself (curing negative status effect, boosting stats, healing, etc.), force it to make a WIS save against your Move DC. On a failure, you gain the positive effect and the target's move fails.

contest.effect: Shows off the Pokemonâ€™s appeal about as well as the move used just before it.
